alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 30 at 6:03PM CDT until March 30 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 78 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 18 PARISHES IN SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA ASCENSION ASSUMPTION EAST BATON ROUGE IBERVILLE JEFFERSON LAFOURCHE LIVINGSTON ORLEANS PLAQUEMINES ST. BERNARD ST. CHARLES ST. HELENA ST. JAMES ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST ST. TAMMANY TANGIPAHOA TERREBONNE WASHINGTON IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHERN MISSISSIPPI AMITE PIKE WALTHALL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMITE, BATON ROUGE, BAYOU CANE, BAYOU SORREL, BELLE CHASSE, BOGALUSA, BURAS, CHALMETTE, CONVENT, COVINGTON, CUT OFF, DARLINGTON, DENHAM SPRINGS, DESTREHAN, DEXTER, DONALDSONVILLE, EASLEYVILLE, EAST NEW ORLEANS, ENON, FRANKLINTON, GALLIANO, GILLSBERG, GLOSTER, GONZALES, GRAMERCY, GREENSBURG, HAMMOND, HOUMA, KENNER, LABADIEVILLE, LACOMBE, LAPLACE, LAROSE, LIBERTY, LUTCHER, MANDEVILLE, MCCOMB, METAIRIE, MONTPELIER, NEW ORLEANS, NORCO, PAINCOURTVILLE, PIERRE PART, PLAQUEMINE, POINTE A LA HACHE, PONCHATOULA, PORT SULPHUR, PRAIRIEVILLE, RACELAND, RESERVE, ROBERT, SALEM, SLIDELL, SMITHDALE, THIBODAUX, TYLERTOWN, VIOLET, WALKER, WATSON, AND WHITE CASTLE.
